items.sentence: Do you really think that you can do that by yourself?
I didn't think that Tom could speak French that well.
I think that it's unlikely that Tom will be arrested.
The previous tenants turned the home into a meth lab.
Tom can barely afford to pay rent let alone buy a PC.
I think that your talents could be put to better use.
What's it like to be the smartest person in the room?
There wasn't anything Tom could've done to help Mary.
When was the last time that you and Tom went dancing?
There's a truck stop about three miles north of here.
